mapper.sql: id, url, path, component, name, iconCls, keepAlive, requireAuth, parentId, enabled
mapper.select: SELECT m1.*, m2.id AS id2, m2.url AS url2, m2.path AS path2, m2.component AS component2, m2.`name` AS name2, m2.iconCls AS iconCls2, m2.keepAlive AS keepAlive2, m2.requireAuth AS requireAuth2, m2.parentId AS parentId2, m2.enabled AS enabled2 FROM t_menu m1, t_menu m2, t_menu_role mr, t_admin_role ar WHERE m1.id = m2.parentId AND m2.id = mr.mid AND mr.rid = ar.rid AND ar.adminId = #{id} ORDER BY m1.id

SELECT m2.id AS id, m2.`name` AS name, CASE WHEN IFNULL( m2.id, 0 ) = 0 THEN "" ELSE "true" END AS checked FROM t_menu m1, t_menu m2, t_menu_role mr WHERE m1.id = m2.parentId AND m2.id = mr.mid AND m2.enabled = 1 AND mr.rid = #{rid} ORDER BY m1.id
SELECT m.*, r.id AS rid, r.`name` AS rname, r.nameZh AS rnameZh FROM t_menu m, t_menu_role mr, t_role r WHERE m.id = mr.mid AND mr.rid = r.id ORDER BY m.id
SELECT tm.name FROM t_role tr, t_menu_role tmr, t_menu tm WHERE tr.id = tmr.rid AND tmr.mid = tm.id AND tr.id = #{rid}
select mid from t_menu_role where rid=#{rid};
